choiceresponse.label: Which three Tahoe features are ONLY available to our Premium plan customers?

checkboxgroup.choice: Deep insights via the Business Intelligence Connector Yes, the BI Connector is a Premium feature.
Single Sign On No, SSO is also part of the Pro plan.
API endpoints Yes, API endpoints are a Premium feature.
A staging (sandbox) site Yes, only Premium plan customers get a sandbox testing site.
Course Access Groups No, Course Access Groups is also part of the Pro plan.
Virtual Labs No, you can add Virtual Labs to any Tahoe plan, or even run it standalone!
